mapper.insert: insert into notifications (id, `from`, `to`, parent, child, `type`, `read`, `time`) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{from,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{to,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{child,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{read,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update notifications set `from` = #{from,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `to` = #{to,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent = #{parent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, child = #{child,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `read` = #{read,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `time` = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, `from`, `to`, parent, child, `type`, `read`, `time` from notifications
